data.name: tankman/skills/camouflage_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Reduces vehicle visibility.</shortDesc> Effective skill level is averaged across the entire crew. The skill is cumulative with the effects of Camouflage and a Camouflage Net.

data.name: tankman/skills/fire_fighting_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Enhances firefighting abilities.</shortDesc> Effective skill level is averaged across the entire crew.

data.name: tankman/skills/repair_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Accelerates repairs to damaged modules.</shortDesc> Effective skill level is averaged across the entire crew. The skill cumulative with the effects of Toolbox and Large Repair Kit.

data.name: tankman/skills/brotherhood_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Improves major qualifications and all skills for the entire crew.</shortDesc> The perk is cumulative with the effects of Improved Ventilation, Extra Combat Rations, Chocolate, Case of Cola, Pudding and Tea, Strong Coffee, Improved Combat Rations, Onigiri, Buchty, Coffee with Buns, and Bread with Smalec.

data.name: tankman/skills/commander_eagleEye_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Increases Maximum View Range.</shortDesc> The skill is more effective if observation devices are damaged, or when combined with Situational Awareness, Coated Optics, and Binocular Telescope.

data.name: tankman/skills/commander_expert_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Enables the Commander to identify critically damaged modules on targeted vehicles within the view range.</shortDesc> Is effective both in indirect and direct fire modes.

data.name: tankman/skills/commander_sixthSense_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Enables the Commander to identify whether the vehicle has been spotted by the enemy.</shortDesc>

data.name: tankman/skills/commander_tutor_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Provides additional experience to all crew members except the Commander.</shortDesc>

data.name: tankman/skills/commander_universalist_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Enables the Commander to master every qualification and replace knocked-out crew members.</shortDesc> Only major qualifications can be substituted. The replacement effect diminishes with each crew member knocked out.

data.name: tankman/skills/driver_badRoadsKing_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Reduces ground resistance when driving on soft and moderately soft terrain.</shortDesc> Lower ground resistance increases vehicle maneuverability and acceleration. The skill is cumulative with the effects of Additional Grousers.

data.name: tankman/skills/driver_rammingMaster_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Decreases ramming damage to your vehicle and increases ramming damage to an enemy vehicle.</shortDesc> The skill is effective only while your vehicle is in motion. The skill is ineffective when two allied vehicles collide.

data.name: tankman/skills/driver_smoothDriving_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Improves accuracy when firing on the move.</shortDesc> The skill is not effective if the vehicle is stationary or rotating. The skill is cumulative with the effects of Vertical Stabilizer.

data.name: tankman/skills/driver_tidyPerson_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Reduces the chance of engine fire by preventing gas or oil leakage in the engine compartment.</shortDesc> The perk is cumulative with the effects of Automatic Fire Extinguishers.

data.name: tankman/skills/driver_virtuoso_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Increases vehicle traverse speed.</shortDesc> The skill is cumulative with the effects of Additional Grousers, Lend-Lease Oil, Quality Oil, Removed Speed Governor, 100-octane Gasoline, and 105-octane Gasoline.

data.name: tankman/skills/gunner_gunsmith_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Improves accuracy of a damaged gun.</shortDesc> If two Gunners have the skill, only the higher rating is effective. The skill is cumulative with the effects of Vertical Stabilizer.

data.name: tankman/skills/gunner_rancorous_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Makes targeted enemy vehicles visible for two more seconds.</shortDesc> The perk is effective both in direct and indirect fire modes. If two Gunners have the perk, the effect is not cumulative.

data.name: tankman/skills/gunner_smoothTurret_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Improves accuracy during turret rotation.</shortDesc> If two Gunners have the skill, only the higher rating is effective. The skill is cumulative with the effects of Vertical Stabilizer.

data.name: tankman/skills/gunner_sniper_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Increases the chance to cause damage to enemy vehicle modules and crew. </shortDesc> It is effective only with AP, APCR, and HEAT shells. If two Gunners have the perk, the effect is not cumulative.

data.name: tankman/skills/gunner_woodHunter_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Adds 1 meter to Maximum View Range unobstructed by trees and bushes.</shortDesc> The perk comes into effect when it reaches 100%. If two Gunners have the perk, the effect is not cumulative.

data.name: tankman/skills/loader_desperado_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Accelerates gun loading if the vehicle has less than 10% of its hit points left.</shortDesc> If two Loaders have the perk, the effect is not cumulative. The perk is cumulative with the effects of Gun Rammer.

data.name: tankman/skills/loader_intuition_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Creates a chance that the Loader will promptly switch between shell types, either while the gun is loaded or during the loading process.</shortDesc> Loading of a new shell type resumes exactly from the point at which it was stopped. If two Loaders have the perk, the effect increases.

data.name: tankman/skills/loader_pedant_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Increases ammo rack durability: the shells do not come into contact with each other. </shortDesc> If two Loaders have the perk, the effect is not cumulative. The perk is cumulative with the effects of "Wet" Ammo Rack.

data.name: tankman/skills/radioman_finder_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Extends View Range.</shortDesc> If two Radio Operators have the skill, only the higher rating is effective. The skill is cumulative with the effects of Recon, Coated Optics and Binocular Telescope.

data.name: tankman/skills/radioman_inventor_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Extends Signal Range.</shortDesc> If two Radio Operators have the skill, only the higher rating is effective.

data.name: tankman/skills/radioman_lastEffort_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Enables a Radio Operator who survived the destruction of his vehicle to report enemy positions for another two seconds.</shortDesc> If two Radio Operators have the perk, the effect is not cumulative.

data.name: tankman/skills/radioman_retransmitter_descr
data.value: <shortDesc>Extends Signal Range of allied communications within vehicle's radio coverage.</shortDesc> Does not affect the Signal Range of your vehicle. If two Radio Operators have the skill, only the higher rating is effective.

data.name: tankman/Skill_not_be_used
data.value: Certain skills and perks may cease to operate when a tanker changes vehicles.

data.name: tankman/skills/type/perk
data.value: Perk. Comes into effect after it reaches 100%.

data.name: tankman/skills/type/perk_common
data.value:
Perk. Comes into effect after
all crew members reach 100%.

data.name: tankman/skills/type/skill
data.value:
Skill. Comes into effect after the training starts.
The effect increases with skill level.

data.name: tankman/skills/brotherhood_female_descr
data.value:
<shortDesc>Improves major qualifications and all skills for all crew members.</shortDesc> The perk is cumulative with the effects of Improved Ventilation, Extra Combat Rations, Chocolate, Case of Cola, Pudding and Tea, Strong Coffee, Improved Combat Rations, Onigiri, Buchty, Coffee with Buns, Bread with Smalec.
• All female crew members have this perk trained by default. • Cannot be reset.

data.name: tankman/skills/brotherhood_permanent_descr
data.value:
<shortDesc>Improves major qualifications and all skills for the entire crew.</shortDesc> The perk is cumulative with the effects of Improved Ventilation, Extra Combat Rations, Chocolate, Case of Cola, Pudding and Tea, Strong Coffee, Improved Combat Rations, Onigiri, Buchty, Coffee with Buns, and Bread with Smalec.
The perk cannot be reset.
